title: #1504 They're Looking For Equal Justice...For Their Hog
itunes:title: #1504 They're Looking For Equal Justice...For Their Hog
description:
Adam and Dr. Drew open the show exploring in detail the lyrics and ideas behind one of John Lennon's biggest hits and what the reality of his lyrics would look like if applied to the practical world. This leads to a conversation about the differences between 'takers' and 'makers' and how they function in our society. Turning to the phones next they speak to a caller wondering if we may be able to harken back to days of yore with some Adam & Drew animations. They also speak to a caller whose mother had an adverse reaction to the monoclonal antibodies and suffered a bad reaction.
